amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in the Congressional Record to add a section to H.R. 2842 which states that section 2 of the bill and the amendments made by section 2 shall not take effect unless the Secretary finds that such section and amendments, if in effect, shall not result in a net loss of jobs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A003) Failed by voice vote.
